captions.text:
Walking down the street 
my eyes met yours

I turn around and look 
at my toes and look up slowly

Eyes getting bigger, 
Lips parting
Heart ringing in my ears

60 seconds enough, story 
You are in my heart

I don't doubt it You took me away 
not in a short time

You are like that to me enough story 
I don't need a reason

You made my heart flutter 
and made me find you

The first time 
the time

Your voice stops 
Tears slowly filling up, flowing tears

I hold with my heart and then 
let you go
Distant eyes my lips lost words
My heart stops at your sigh

60 seconds is enough story 
you are out of my life

I didn't stop you I saw your feelings 
Not short time

You are that kind of person story 
You sent the message

You told me you are hurt 
I let you go, last that time

(My two story) Hot(story) 
Cold time(With U)
Both memories from you

(My two story) 
Same time different you
Two sides of my memory

60 seconds enough,story 
You are in my heart

I don't doubt it,You took me 
away not in a short time

You are like that to me enough story 
You disappeared from my life

I didn't stop you I saw your feelings 
Not short time

comments.author: phuong tran

comments.text:
The story goes like this: 
He was walking by when suddenly, he saw her. The girl he once loved and 
lost. He wanted to say something but she walked into a caffe bar. He didn´t 
know why but still, he followed her inside. She was working at the bar and 
he sat down watching her. The memories of their time together started 
coming back. He also  begins to remember the moment she left him returning 
the ring he gave her. He took his own ring, left it on the table and walked 
out. When she came to the table, she saw the ring and ran after him to 
return it. He slowly turned toward her and recognition light up in her 
eyes. As if time itself unvieded they were back were it all started. The 
rain was falling and he offered his umbrella to a soaked girl. And now, 
their story has come to an end. He closed her hand around the ring which 
meant now the story ended for them both. 
He turns and walks away moving on. 
A story about how so many things can happen in 60 seconds. The beginning 
and the end.
Nina & Tamara 
Amazing video...love you guys :)))) ﻿
comments.author: Tamara Tamara

comments.text:
From what I know, the music video means this:
L sees a girl that he has an interest in.
The girl walks back into the cafe, so he follows her in.
The girl works at the cafe.
He sits on a table, and here's the slightly confusing part.
He uses 60 seconds to foresee their relationship in the future IF they were 
to fall in love.
It would start out all happy, making spaghetti and reading together. He 
would give her a matching couple ring as a gift.
But in the end, they would have to face a painful breakup, which ends up 
with the girl returning the couple ring to L.
60 seconds of seeing the future is now over, and he returns back to modern 
time (present time).
Knowing that if he fell in love with her, they would breakup, he just 
leaves his ring that he would give her in the future on the table, and 
leaves.
The girl sees that L left his ring, and she goes after him to return it.
The girl doesnt know anything about the future.
Instead of taking it, L just tells her to keep the ring.
The girl is confused, and looks into L's eyes, and she then also sees the 
future of their relationshop that L saw.
Thats why the clock goes backwards 60 seconds, to show that the girl also 
saw their future.
The rain and umbrella scene is showing how they would have met if L decided 
to date her.
But since L doesnt want to fall in love with her, he ends up walking out of 
the cafe alone with an umbrella, just by himself.
Thats why the song quotes "it only takes 60 seconds to know the story." 
I hope this helped ^^﻿

comments.text:
what i think is the story: The two leads used to have a relationship in the 
past. myungsoo sees her again in the future and recalls all of the good and 
bad memories he had of her on 60 seconds. Although they broke up, they 
honestly still love each other (hence the crying). She then also remembers 
the good and bad memories that they had. So i think it's trying to say that 
60 seconds is enough for me to remember you, or that it only takes 60 
seconds for me to remember you. but idk﻿

comments.text:
If you have watched the mv with subs, you'll understand how the story goes. 
The guy went to a restaurant where his ex gf works. He then reminisced how 
their relationship run for only a short time- happy moments then bitter 
quarrels. He wanted to give her the ring but he doesnt have enough courage 
to approach her so he left it at the table. The girl remembered him with 
teary eyes. I think 60 seconds imply how their relationship ended with just 
60 seconds of the girl maybe saying let's break up. *sobs*

That just sounds like a fanfic huh? Haha! I know woollim produces weird MVs 
but the plot is good.﻿

comments.author: Krishma Buwakul

comments.text:
Ok so basically, here is my theory of the story:
In the future, the relationship doesnt end well, he ended up going back in 
time to the day they met, upon his return he forgot his purpose and 
repeated the steps he made the time he met the girl. he followed her and 
sat down but slowly he started to regain his memories of the future and 
realizing the reason he came to the past, he became emotional but still 
didn't let the relationship begin.
OR
He had the power to see the future and saw it would end in heart break he 
didnt let the relationship begin and he gave the girl the ring. she started 
to cry because she probably had the power to feel his heartbreak therefore 
understanding his situation. the ending must have been how the relationship 
would have started. 
OR
They had both gone through memory loss. upon repeating the same steps as he 
did the first time he met her, he started to regain the memories but 
 realised the relationship didnt end well, so he didnt confront her but 
instead gave her his ring as a symbol of love, and at the moment she must 
have recognized the ring and regained her own memories including the one 
where they first met (under the umbrella). ﻿

comments.text:
I don't know why but i thought that the story goes like this :
L was married to a girl but she left him.
Then he meets a girl that looks like her.
In the song they say "two sides of the same memory."
I got that as that there are two girls but the situations are similar.
He hadn't given up on the girl who left him.
But after he met the other girl who looks like her he decides to finally 
give up.
I think this's wrong but the way i understood it at first made me tear up 
so i wanted to share how i thought. Hehe. ﻿
